attributionInfo.mlsDisclaimer:
The data relating to real estate for sale on this web site comes in part from the Broker Reciprocity Program of GAMLS. All real estate listings are marked with the GAMLS Broker Reciprocity thumbnail logo and detailed information about them includes the name of the listing brokers.
The broker providing these data believes them to be correct, but advises interested parties to confirm them before relying on them in a purchase decision.

data.description: Beautifully maintained freshly painted 3beds/3baths townhome w/a beautiful new walls of window sunroom and privacy fencing.  With a entertaining family room with a cozy fireplace and high ceilings, your family would love Tv time in this space.  The AC unit was replaced in 2011.  The furnace/air handler unit was replaced in 7/2017.  Hot water heater replaced in 12/2014.  The roof was replaced in 2008.  The gutters were replaced in 7/2003, and installed gutters for the new windows. This lovely home that has new front and back screen doors.  Master suite is spacious with a nice size walk-in closet.  The on suite has a modern double sink, separate shower and soaker tub.  Also, another spacious secondary bedroom upstairs.  Bedroom on the main with easy access to a full bathroom.  With two storage rooms out back, will be so convenient and useful! Won't last long, so hurry come and check it out!
